entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming partly cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of rain showers before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 at times early this evening. Wind becoming light overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:12 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Periods of freezing rain over northern sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:12 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
